channel.title: Someone help me with this code please!

item.title: Someone help me with this code please!
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

[quote=“Paintball199, post:5, topic:129869”]lol, that code will make this there are more then 10 Players on or 10 Players,
It will Disconnects Everyone that Comes on. lol[/quote]

LOL, This is only checken on login.
So, when someone logs in it return code 2 (wich means you logged in)
And if there are 10players online then it wont let you login.
It show codes 7 wich means the world is full.
But, if your playerrights is higher then 10 it will let you login.

The disconnect is only placed there becouse else your client will freeze and you have to reloed it before you could chose a diferent world/ip
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 08:11:03 AM[/size][hr]if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 10) && (playerRights <= 1){ returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me with this code please!

item.title: Someone help me with this code please!
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

I can have multiple ports as I want. Its called if you dont believe try awesomepk.no-ip.info

ports:
43594
33333
44444

and can someone post like what i should change?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 06:30:23 AM[/size][hr]i made the code this but it still says server full try a differnt world when the max # of players work please help!

if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 10) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; } else if (playerRights >= 1) { }

Read full topic

item.title: Someone help me with this code please!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“montalvom, post:1, topic:129869”]Ok, i want to make this code so admins/mod/owners can log in at anytime any port.

if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 10) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; }

Is there a possible way of doing this? Please post and help me out thanks!

MONTALVO :D[/quote]

That has nothing to do with it?
and with any port, not possible, your server listens on ONE port only

Read full topic
